main event: On February 6, 1952, a civilian reported observing a bright, unidentified flying object over Kansas City, Missouri, for approximately 15-20 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as bright and round, and reportedly executed unusual maneuvers., The sighting was made from the observer's residence while investigating strange lights in the sky., The object seemed to drop small incandescent objects to the ground., Several other sightings were recorded in the area by military and civilian personnel around the same date., The document is part of Project Blue Book, which investigated UFO phenomena.
